src_original: iha mahāyānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā tathāgatam anabhyākhyātukāmena,
tgt_original: 求佛道善男子、善女人，不欲謗佛者，應以善根如是迴向。

src_original: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni yajjātikāni yatsvabhāvāni yallakṣaṇāni yayā dharmatayā saṃvidyante.
tgt_original: 「如諸佛心、佛智、佛眼，知見是善根福德，本、末、體相，從何而有？

src_original: tathāham apy anumode yathā te buddhā bhagavanto jānanti tathāham api pariṇāmayāmy  anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye. evaṃ mahāyānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tāni  kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayitavyāny anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye. evaṃ ca pariṇāmayaṃs  tathāgatān nābhyācaṣṭe uktavādī ca bhavati. tathāgatasya dharmavādī,
tgt_original: 我亦如是，隨諸佛知見隨喜，如諸佛所許，我亦如是以善根迴向，若菩薩如是迴向，則不謗諸佛亦無過咎。

src_original: caivaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariṇāmo nirviṣo bhavati.  iti buddhānujñātapariṇāmaḥ
tgt_original: 」深心信解如實迴向，是名「大迴向、具足迴向」。

src_original: punar aparaṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ (PSP_2-3:134)  carataivaṃ tāni kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayitavyāni,
tgt_original: 復次，須菩提！ 善男子、善女人，以諸善根福德應如是迴向。
